item.title: UltraBlog.vim: Ultimate Vim Blogging Plugin
item.author: 作者
item.description: Introduction UltraBlog.vim is yet another Vim blogging script for Wordpress. The biggest difference between UB and other similar scripts is that UB is an ultimate client, which stores posts locally in an SQLite database, while others just operate remotely.
